## ClassMembersMap.moveMembersToClass() method

Move class members from this map to a class declaration, and clear this map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveMembersToClass(classDecl: ClassDeclarationImpl): ClassDeclarationImpl;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  classDecl | [ClassDeclarationImpl](./ts-morph-structures.classdeclarationimpl.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[ClassDeclarationImpl](./ts-morph-structures.classdeclarationimpl.md)

the new class declaration.
